name: The Freemason [UK] (IAPSOP)
content:
The Freemason [UK] (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: The Freemason (UK) Summary: From Pat Deveney's database: Freemason, The. A Weekly Journal of Freemasonry, Literature, Science, and Art. Truth is the Body of God, and Light is His Shadow.—Plato 1869—1919 Weekly London, England. Succeeds: Masonic Illustrated (merged with, 1906) Succeeded by: The Freemason and Masonic Illustrated 1/1, March 13, 1869. 8 pp., 12s. A journal of Masonic news and lodge activities published with the sanction of the Grand Master of the Grand Lodge of England. Cornell University; Wilmington Library; University of Massachusetts, Amherst; BNF; Texas A&M University, etc. Issues:Freemason V1-2 1869 Freemason V3 1870 Freemason V4 1871 Partial Freemason V7 1874 Freemason V8 1875 Freemason V9 1876 Freemason V10 1877 Freemason V11 1878 Freemason V12 1879
